==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|でん|ごん|yomi=o}}

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|でんごん|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|でんごん|kyu=傳言}}

# [[message]]

====Usage notes====
There is an implication that '''伝言''' refers to a [[verbal]] message, but this is not always the case; it can also refer to a written message. It is frequently used in association with telephone calls.

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|ＳＭＳ}}

====Idioms====
* {{ja-r|伝言を頼まれる|でんごん を たのまれる}}: to be charged with a message for someone

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|伝言板|でんごんばん}}: [[message board]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|でんごん|kyu=傳言}}

# to send [[word]]; to give a message

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|でんごん}}
